snippet: An American drone fired missiles into a compound in the Orakzai tribal region on Thursday, killing 18 Afghans and wounding 4.
abstract: American drone fires missiles into compound in the Orakzai tribal region of Pakistan, killing 18 Afghans and wounding 4.
lead_paragraph: An American drone fired missiles into a compound in the Orakzai tribal region on Thursday, killing 18 Afghans and wounding 4.
